tool_description: API to check Fraud Score of an IP
name: Fraud Score IP
title: Fraud Score IP

api_list.name: BASIC API USAGE
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://fraud-score-ip.p.rapidapi.com/api/risk/BOG-RISK-hh73164o99/1.1.1.1"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fraud-score-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://fraud-score-ip.p.rapidapi.com/api/risk/BOG-RISK-hh73164o99/{ip}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "fraud-score-ip.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
